============
lookup_value
============

.. py:attribute:: lookup_value

**domain**: server

**language**: python

:doc:`Field class </refs/server/field_api>`

Description
===========

Use ``lookup_value`` property to get the lookup value of the 
:doc:`lookup field </programming/data/lookup_fields>`

If the field is 
:doc:`lookup field </programming/data/lookup_fields>` 
gives its lookup value, 
otherwise gives the value of the 
:doc:`value <at_value>`
property

See also
========

:doc:`Fields </programming/data/fields>`

:doc:`Lookup fields </programming/data/lookup_fields>`

:doc:`lookup_value <at_lookup_value>`

:doc:`lookup_text <at_lookup_text>`
